docs.lead_paragraph: TOKYO, Jan. 21--Travelers in Japan these days could get the impression anywhere that the country is inhabited exclusively by happy, smiling people, vibrant with health and oozing familial affection.

headline.main: On Election Posters All the Japanese Are Happy

docs.snippet: TOKYO, Jan. 21--Travelers in Japan these days could get the impression anywhere that the country is inhabited exclusively by happy, smiling people, vibrant with health and oozing familial affection.

byline.original: By ROBERT TRUMBULL Special to The New York Times
